{{Han compound|埶|火|c1=p|c2=s|t2=fire|ls=psc|alt2=灬}}.

===Etymology===
{{zh-ref|Schuessler (2007)}} considers this a *''-t'' derivation of {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*nwe||warm}} (with initial *''n-'' ~ ''ŋ-'' [[vacillation]]), whence also {{cog|my|နွေး||warm; lukewarm}} and {{m|my|နွှေး||to warm something; to revise}}.

Often considered to be related to {{och-l|爇|to burn; to toast}} and {{och-l|焫|hot}}.
